data.title: Edwin Balmer, Philip Wylie
data.meta_description: New York : A Dell Book, 1952 . Small octavo, pictorial wrappers. First paperback edition. Dell Book 627. According to the publisher's statement, this is a new revised edition. Chip from spine panel appears to be a binding flaw , else a fine, unread copy. #158137
data.text:
Balmer, Edwin and Philip Wylie. WHEN WORLDS COLLIDE. [New York]: A Dell Book, [1952]. Small octavo, pictorial wrappers. First paperback edition. Dell Book 627. According to the publisher's statement, this is a "new revised edition." Chip from spine panel (appears to be a binding flaw), else a fine, unread copy. (#158137).

Price: $25.00
